comment: /**  * Read from the supplied {@code InputStream} and deserialize the contents  * into an object.  * @see ObjectInputStream#readObject()  */
code: /**  * Read from the supplied {@code InputStream} and deserialize the contents  * into an object.  * @see ObjectInputStream#readObject()  */ @Override @SuppressWarnings("resource") public Object deserialize(InputStream inputStream) throws IOException {     ObjectInputStream objectInputStream = new ConfigurableObjectInputStream(inputStream, this.classLoader).     try {         return objectInputStream.readObject().     } catch (ClassNotFoundException ex) {         throw new NestedIOException("Failed to deserialize object type", ex).     } }
